content.rendered:
Welcome to Colombia, and welcome to La Sierra International School (LASIS)!

Our Director warmly welcomes you to La Sierra International School (LASIS) in Colombia. Since our founding in 2012, we have grown significantly and currently provide a U.S.-accredited education to over 500 students from Nursery school to 12th Grade. At LASIS, we value responsible behavior and good values, while maintaining high standards for academic excellence.

Are encourage our students to be confident and self-directed learners from a young age. Our goal is to nurture each child's unique potential and develop leaders who can creatively and collaboratively face and resolve challenges.

As students progress through our school, we allow their individual personalities to shine while strengthening core values such as trustworthiness, responsibility, caring, respect, fairness, and citizenship. We also encourage athletic and artistic competence and provide enriching interactions with other schools in Colombia and abroad. Our activities, such as Model United Nations, help us develop future leaders who are poised, compassionate, and ethical.

Success at LASIS is thanks to our highly qualified and dedicated faculty and staff, who come from various countries, including the U.S., Canada, England, Nigeria, France, and Colombia. Our teachers, students, and parents enthusiastically participate in community outreach projects that help instill empathy and a sense of civic responsibility towards others.

Our campus spans over 12 acres of lush greenery and is home to a diverse range of flora and fauna. Our students and staff appreciate the natural beauty and breathtaking views of the mountains surrounding our campus.

We take pride in being a part of a great team that celebrates each of our students' successes. So, on behalf of our Director and the LASIS community, we invite you to explore our website and learn more about what makes our school an extraordinary place to be.

Laura Horbal – Director
